meanings.definition: In a sigmoidal manner; resembling an S-shaped curve.
meanings.sent1: The line on the graph increased sigmoidally, showing a gradual rise followed by a steep incline.
meanings.sent2: The data points plotted sigmoidally, forming a distinct S-shaped curve.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched sigmoidally, arching its back in a perfect S-curve.
meanings.sent4: The river meandered sigmoidally through the valley, mimicking the shape of a snake.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster track twisted sigmoidally, giving riders a thrilling experience.
